name: Greenleaf
description: Greenleaf is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and classic button design, this robot stands out among its peers. Its arms and legs are made from sturdy foundry materials, giving it both strength and durability. The laser screen provides precise and accurate readings, making Greenleaf an invaluable tool for analyzing electronic signals. With its unique combination of traits, Greenleaf is ready to navigate through the world of technology and help its club members succeed.
